H0.text: Coat color is the physical characteristic of a puppy most likely inherited from its parents.

H1.text: Desire to play fetch is the physical characteristic of a puppy most likely inherited from its parents.

H2.text: Body weight is the physical characteristic of a puppy most likely inherited from its parents.

H3.text: Ability to follow commands is the physical characteristic of a puppy most likely inherited from its parents.

A4.text: The cat's genes code for dark hair, thus the hair-producing cells in the cat make cellular proteins resulting in dark hair.
